RZ8G.F.summary: SNGN Romgaz SA engages in the exploration, development, and production of natural gas resources in Romania. It holds a 100% interest in 9 exploration-development-production blocks located in Romania. The company produces natural gas through 3,050 wells and surface facilities; and electricity with an installed capacity of 800 megawatts. It also engages in the trading of natural gas; transportation of general goods and persons; well recompletion operations, workover and special well operations, and production test works; and underground storage of natural gas. The company was founded in 1909 and is headquartered in Medias, Romania.
